attributes.action: Reconsider the decision for Liquid nightclub in Rotherham to become a mosque
attributes.additional_details:
Given all the issues recently with peodaphile rings and the minority group they have come from we as a community should not allow this to happen.
This is not a petition to banish muslims far from it this is simply saying if I tried to build a church in a muslim country it would not be allowed !
You can live here but we are wsternised therefore you shoudl be to
attributes.background: The council are yet to confirm these plans - teh old grounds of Liquid Nightclub on Main Street Rotherham are to be converted into the Norths largest Mosque.

rejection.details:
This seems to be the responsibility of Rotherham Metropolitan Borough Council. You can start an e-petition to the council here:

http://www.rotherham.gov.uk/info/100004/council_and_democracy/871/epetitions
